doc.title: 5 Tears
doc.plot: Part poem, part spell, '5 Tears' is a shedding of past debts. Originally hand crafted on 35mm leader, each tear represents a point of regret that gets purged. Fake religion, fake friends, false society, lost love, and loss of innocence are the basic tear themes.
